p.d: Alex and Lee unpack the mystery of handlebar width. Mountain bike handlebars are a compromise between 5 elements of fit: Pushing; pulling; range of motion; stability and joint health. Later, Sean and Alex take a look at the tools they use to replace crashing. The manual machine is probably the newest tool in the toolbox of progression and one of the best. They talk about setup, how to and best practices to get the most from your time on the manual machine.
